response.overview: Thereâ€™s been a movement in New England.  Woods racers from all over have been flocking to this off-road wonderland in order to challenge for supremacy in the highly regarded J-Day Off-road Series.  Never before has this region seen such a dramatic influx of talent and intensity.  The unique format that is J-Day Off-road brings in riders from all disciplines of off-road racing, from Supercross Riders to Trials Experts.  The courses are unique and different at every round combining a thrilling, blood pumping mix of unique woods sections, motocross and enduro-cross sections as well.  Each round features a variety of mixed terrain including sand, loam, rocks, and even roots.  All of this tied together by the hair raising technical obstacles that are the J-Day Extreme Sections.  Racers of all ages leave nothing on the table as they traverse these thrilling tracks and astound fans at every venue.
response.tagline: The future of off road has arrived. The highly anticipated J Day Off Road Series has been taking the motocross industry by storm. This series is exactly what the off road industry needed.
response.title: Resurgence
